description: Greece insists such accusations are an insult but some migrants documented their trips with GPS.
title: Pushbacks: Migrants accuse Greece of sending them back out to sea
title_page: Pushbacks: Migrants accuse Greece of sending them back out to sea - BBC News
maintext: "They said they wanted to go to hospital or the migrant camp. My wife left to get some cash so that we can put them in a taxi," said Mr Theodorou, an assistant professor at the University of the Aegean. But when he suggested calling the police, the women feared their passage to Europe would come to an abrupt end.
